name: Lazer Reflector! (One Hour Game Jam 68)
description:
Reflect the 'lazer' to hit the goal.

This is a game about reflection made in a hour using Pico-8, for the 68th One Hour Game Jam. If you're interested in how it works, the source code is available.

The theme for this One Hour Game Jam was 'mirror'.

Instructions

  • Use the arrow keys to move the mirrors.
  • Adjust the mirrors so the 'lazer' is reflected in to the goal.
  • The game never ends. Keep reflecting until you're arrow keys wear down!
